page.title: 16Healthcare in N.St Ives.
page.content: There are no clinics or doctors in north St.Ives but there are quite a few in the other parts of St.Ives. most people think their doctors or clinics are good. People are satisfied with the care they receive in hospitals ,and most do not have far to travel for medical care.More people go to the doctors surgery than to a clinic. When one is ill one really needs to own a car as the surgeries are largely in the town centre.Elderly people have to rely on others to transport them to see a doctor or ask for a home visit. If Hospital treatment is ever necessary the N.St Ivian has a choice of two hospitals,HINCHINGBROOKE,seven miles away,or ADDENBROOKES,about fifteen miles away.Both have excellent facilities.
